name: Charlotte Mont D'Or

trigger.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Play this card.

text: Activate: Main: You may rest this Character and add the top or bottom card of your Life Area to your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: You may rest this Character and add the top or bottom card of your Life Area to your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
